titleStmt.title: Two sermons on these wordes of Peter the apostle, honour all men, loue brotherly felowship ... preached at Marlebrough the seuenth of Nouember, and fifth of Ianuarie 1595 / by Charles Pynner, minister of the Church of Wotton-Basset in Northwiltshire.
titleStmt.author: Pinner, Charles.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through; page numbers defaced.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
